Alright. Here's a fix for all of you having troubles with saves.

*this is for the reloaded release*

This update is to be applied with the original crack. The original crack has a folder in it named out. Within that folder are two folders named profiles and save. This is where your saves will go. Without these folders you will not get your saves! Copy them over, or create them, as they are originally empty. Good luck, and I hope this helps.

Alright. Here's a fix for all of you having troubles with saves.

*this is for the reloaded release*

This update is to be applied with the original crack. The original crack has a folder in it named out. Within that folder are two folders named profiles and save. This is where your saves will go. Without these folders you will not get your save! Copy them over, or create them, as they are originally empty. Good luck, and I hope this helps.

This is from official site note:
Hereâ€™s the latest from us on Dead Island PC for North American users. We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience caused to fans who wanted to spend their day crushing some zombie skulls. Thank you very much for your continued patience and support and we are completely committed to ensuring that you have an excellent time with our game.

Â· First, the correct version of the title is now available on Steam and fans are able to download it now.

Â· Second, the day 1 patch notes in their entirety are below. Please note that this update may cause incompatibilities between the incorrect version of Dead Island that was released and the fixed version and cause a wipe on some saved data. However, we have a solution to help regain some quest progress: When the game opens, select New Game -> Select the same character as you were using before, and then there will be an option for "Chapter Select" which will allow the player to jump to the last chapter they were playing in

Complete list of improvements:

Multiplayer and Matchmaking improvements
â€¢ Maps are now correctly synchronized when player joins during map loading
â€¢ Games now filter correctly in lobby
â€¢ After joining a coop game enemies now spawn correctly

User guidance improved. (Quest guidance, UI, shop)

Additional interface polishing
â€¢ Map tracking now works correctly after loading checkpoints
â€¢ Health and stamina bars of enemies now display correctly in coop.
â€¢ Locations of invisible NPCs are no longer shown
â€¢ More than one player can now use the same ladder simultaneously
â€¢ Focus on items in shops is not changing after operation (sell, buy)
â€¢ Additional Interface polishing
â€¢ Fixed displaying gather rings near some door

Player death behavior improved
â€¢ Respawn position now saved when playing in cooperative mode
â€¢ If player dies whilst inside vehicle, menu will now be hidden

Save game mechanics extended
â€¢ Added distinction between quest checkpoints and other saves

Minor animation fixes
â€¢ AI animation now displays correctly after fast travel or travel through portals

AI improvements
â€¢ Improved enemy awareness (zombies)
â€¢ Enemies reaction to fire adapted
â€¢ Enemies are now able to successfully reach player on some arenas
â€¢ Shooting enemies no longer spawn infinitely

Balancing changes in difficulty, majorly for second playthrough
â€¢ Item level will be calculated correctly when playing in second playthrough
â€¢ Kick interrupting reload now adapted, after clip wis inserted reload is treated as successful
â€¢ Health regeneration is now disabled during grab.
â€¢ More HP for all escorted NPCs
â€¢ Removed all instances of Butcher during escorts
â€¢ Purna can gain bonus rage from both â€œGrim Inspirationâ€ and â€œInspiring Kickâ€
â€¢ Only "Walker" type enemies increase the extra XP of the "Combo" skill from Xianâ€™s Survival skill tree

Pause Option added
â€¢ Added information about players requesting pause (Coop)

Looting rules improved
â€¢ Thrown items now cannot be picked up by another player for 5 minutes.
â€¢ Items from just-opened containers cannot be picked up by another player for 5 seconds.

Minor graphical glitches fixed.
â€¢ Rectified occasional graphical glitch with NPC's hands bend
â€¢ Animations now display correctly when trading
â€¢ Stomper animation now displays correctly when same target is hit by another player

Sound bugs fixed
â€¢ Volume of pickup's engine has been increased

Quest bugs removed
â€¢ All side quests in Laboratory can now be successfully completed
â€¢ Potential walkthrough blocker removed when quest "Knockin' on Heavenâ€™s Door" is completed before talking to Dominik during "On the air" quest

@ Seminkou There's a little more to it than that if you have the STEAM.UNLOCKED-ALI213 version of the game. You do make an out folder in the game directory with 2 sub folders in it with 1 named profiles and 1 named save. But with the version of the game I'm talking about, if you open the DI folder there is also a folder in there named Out, yes with a capital O. What I did is start the game and get to the first checkpoint coming out of the elevator, then I quit the game completely and went to my documents folder. In there a Dead Island folder has appeared and when you open that there is another out folder like the one you created in your game directory. I had to copy the contens within the out folder and paste them in the out folder I created in the first place. Now back to the other folder named Out in the DI folder, I had to delete this folder for it to finally save my games. So to sum up, create out folder in game directory, open that folder and create 2 more folders, 1 named profiles and another named save. Start the game and get to the first checkpoint then quit to desktop. Now the Dead Island folder will be in your Documents folder. Open that folder then open the out folder and copy the contents to the out folder you created. Now go to your game directory and open the folder named DI, and delete the folder in there named Out. Start the game again and get to the checkpoint, quit to the menu and you should be ablle to click continue. Not sure how much clearer I can explain it than that, Hope this helps someone as it took me awhile to figure this out as I really wanted the ALI213 version because I feel it looks the best and is the best quality. 
Take care all and enjoy!
@ Seminkou There's a little more to it than that. I know how to save on any version if anyone needs help just let me know.

Or 2 your not setting your game to single player in options. By default its multiplayer mode. So try changing that. I have no serial popup. I installed it, applied the update and the game wouldn´t play. Missing some .dll. What I did was to reaply the original crack and start ir, then reapplying the update and voila.

So in case you enconter this problem:
1- Install the game 
2- Crack it
3- Start the game (get to the menu) 
4- Exit the game and apply the update (copy files to main directory)
5- Start the game again and it should function properly.

First i installed, updated and cracked in that order and the text was all messed up.
Then i put the update files in again and wrote over everything and it was fixed.
So if you install -> crack -> update, in that order it will probably work. (it says to crack first in the description really, but who reads.)

@HolyDeath3000

where do you find the .ini file for this Reloaded Release because its not in a normal spot...help anyone?

if the game doesn't save, create a ''Out'' folder inside your dead island directory. Inside that folder create a ''Save'' and a ''Profiles'' folder, your game should save properly, just alt-tab after you see a checkpoint on the left side of the screen and check if a save file has been created in the save folder.

Its not actually a ini file, its a scr file.  You can find it here:

deadisland/DI/out/settings/video

To edit it you have to drag the file into an open wordpad document.  Then you have to save the changes and close the document.  

IMPORTANT: you have to set the video.scr to Read Only.  Otherwise your graphics settings we be reset to default when you start the game.
